subtitleNullable: Images of herbal plants growing in Vietnam and its tropical proximity
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Med Herb Lens is a non-profit project that utilises Artificial Intelligence to assist medicinal herbalists and traditional healers and physicians in automatically recognising and classifying medicinal plants.

### Content

The images were manually captured by mobile devices. Each category/herbal plant in the dataset is named using a numerical ID. You can find the English, Vietnamese, and Scientific names in [this Google Sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lWiEq53_1m0tQCvunHNzYT1GFimZiAl_RqP4PNP9grU/edit#gid=0).

At the moment, there are only 7+ classes with just around 100 images each. More plants and images will be added soon at a later date when we have more data. 

### Acknowledgements

This dataset will be crowd-sourced and contributed by the herbal plant lovers community. More details will come soon!
title: Oriental Medicinal Herb Images
subtitle: Images of herbal plants growing in Vietnam and its tropical proximity
description:
### Context

Med Herb Lens is a non-profit project that utilises Artificial Intelligence to assist medicinal herbalists and traditional healers and physicians in automatically recognising and classifying medicinal plants.

### Content

The images were manually captured by mobile devices. Each category/herbal plant in the dataset is named using a numerical ID. You can find the English, Vietnamese, and Scientific names in [this Google Sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lWiEq53_1m0tQCvunHNzYT1GFimZiAl_RqP4PNP9grU/edit#gid=0).

At the moment, there are only 7+ classes with just around 100 images each. More plants and images will be added soon at a later date when we have more data. 

### Acknowledgements

This dataset will be crowd-sourced and contributed by the herbal plant lovers community. More details will come soon!
